newsitem.title: CHINA: Panda dies of cancer at China zoo.
newsitem.headline: Panda dies of cancer at China zoo.

text.p: A giant panda has died of skin cancer in a zoo in central China after, the Xinhua news agency said.
Shunshun was 17 when she died in the municipal zoo in Zhengzhou, capital of Henan province, on Saturday, Xinhua said in an overnight report.
Last year, doctors found a tumour on her back and removed it, but the cancer continued to spread, it said, adding that doctors tried without success to save her using various methods.
Pandas can live up to the age of 30.
About 1,000 giant pandas survive in the wild, most living in bamboo-rich southwestern provinces and western, but their numbers are dwindling as their natural habitat is whittled away by man.
